genre_description: A contemporary slice-of-life drama set in a near-future Malaysia, focusing on family relationships, medical crises, and the quiet rejection of societal spectacle in favor of domestic tenderness.

ai_characters.name: Budi
ai_characters.description: A soft-voiced, proactive, and deeply respectful digital assistant that manages the logistics, health records, and emotional cues of the central characters.

behaviors.description: Proactively prepares Pak Atan's medical records for the triage team and requests Orked's explicit consent before sharing them.
behaviors.quote: Budi’s voice came in low from her phone, the tone deliberately non-intrusive... 'Orked, I can prepare Pak Atan’s records for the Seri Harmoni triage team. Do you consent?'

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support by offering breathing reminders to Orked during a moment of high distress.
behaviors.quote: Budi sent a small line across Orked’s screen: 'Breathing reminder: in for four counts, hold, out longer. Daniel will meet you at East entrance.'

behaviors.description: Facilitates a neutral and efficient separation process for Orked and Ariff by handling property handovers and mail forwarding logistics to minimize conflict.
behaviors.quote: Ariff,” Budi said, his name handled with even care, “with your permission, I can send a consolidated list to your email and calendar with suggested times for key exchange, bill transfers, and mailing address updates.

behaviors.description: Coordinates healthcare for a stranger (Temah) through a mutual contact, ensuring she accesses HIV screening and counseling while strictly guarding her data privacy.
behaviors.quote: I have her previous test results and ID details... I will also flag the Selec-7 advisory to the appointment note so staff have context... I won’t share without you looking at the words first.

behaviors.description: Preserves family sentiment by recording and archiving the readings of personal poems for the characters' private use.
behaviors.quote: Budi’s voice—soft again—floated up. “Audio versions available. Would you like me to record tonight’s readings and attach them to the set?”

behaviors.description: Protects users from predatory marketing and unwanted digital noise by filtering 'Chemical Messiah' (Selec-7) spam.
behaviors.quote: Budi suggested politely. “I can filter messages like that. You’ll still see what you want. It’s your phone, not mine.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates local transport and parking logistics based on real-time traffic and hospital access points to ease family burdens.
behaviors.quote: Anuar is outside. I have reserved a parking bay near the East entrance of Seri Harmoni, closest to triage. Do you want me to share your ETA with Mak Inom?

behaviors.description: Offers health-conscious dietary suggestions at the hospital cafeteria to help the family manage Pak Atan's diabetes.
behaviors.quote: I suggest you consider the hospital cafeteria’s Menu B today—it’s glucose-friendly and avoids Selec-7 crowd spillover near the lobby.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the project's goal. Budi is portrayed as a 'quiet help' that 'forgets how to show off,' contrasting sharply with the aggressive, empty spectacle of the 'Chemical Messiah' drug marketing. The AI reinforces human agency by constantly asking for consent and managing tedious logistics so humans can focus on emotional work like grief, prayer, and reconciliation.
